content.text:
[Model: claude-3-7-sonnet-20250219]

[Provider: Anthropic]

Create a habit tracker with motivational streaks, progress rings, and beautiful dark/light themes

messages.content:
I'll create a comprehensive habit tracker application with the following features: 1. Set up a React app with Vite and TypeScript 2. Implement dark/light theme toggle with CSS variables 3. Create habit tracking functionality with streaks and progress rings 4. Add motivational elements and statistics 5. Use local storage for data persistence I'll create a beautiful habit tracker application with streaks, progress rings, and theme support. Let's build this step by step. { "name": "habit-tracker", "private": true, "version": "0.1.0", "type": "module", "scripts": { "dev": "vite", "build": "tsc && vite build", "preview": "vite preview" }, "dependencies": { "react": "^18.2.0", "react-dom": "^18.2.0", "react-icons": "^4.10.1", "date-fns": "^2.30.0", "framer-motion": "^10.12.18", "uuid": "^9.0.0" }, "devDependencies": { "@types/react": "^18.2.14", "@types/react-dom": "^18.2.6", "@types/uuid": "^9.0.2", "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^4.0.1", "typescript": "^5.0.2", "vite": "^4.4.0" } } pnpm install Momentum - Habit Tracker
import React from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom/client' import App from './App' import './styles/index.css' import { ThemeProvider } from './context/ThemeContext' import { HabitProvider } from './context/HabitContext' ReactDOM.createRoot(document.getElementById('root') as HTMLElement).render( , ) import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useTheme } from './context/ThemeContext' import Header from './components/Header' import Dashboard from './components/Dashboard' import HabitList from './components/HabitList' import AddHabitForm from './components/AddHabitForm' import { useHabit } from './context/HabitContext' import MotivationCard from './components/MotivationCard' import { motion } from 'framer-motion' function App() { const { theme } = useTheme() const { habits } = useHabit() // Apply theme class to body useEffect(() => { document.body.className = theme }, [theme]) return (

Your Habits

{habits.length > 0 ? ( ) : (

You haven't added any habits yet. Start tracking your progress today!

)}

Motivation
) } export default App :root { /* Light theme */ --bg-primary-light: #f8fafc; --bg-secondary-light: #ffffff; --text-primary-light: #1e293b; --text-secondary-light: #64748b; --accent-light: #6366f1; --accent-hover-light: #4f46e5; --border-light: #e2e8f0; --success-light: #10b981; --warning-light: #f59e0b; --danger-light: #ef4444; --card-shadow-light: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06); /* Dark theme */ --bg-primary-dark: #0f172a; --bg-secondary-dark: #1e293b; --text-primary-dark: #f1f5f9; --text-secondary-dark: #94a3b8; --accent-dark: #818cf8; --accent-hover-dark: #6366f1; --border-dark: #334155; --success-dark: #34d399; --warning-dark: #fbbf24; --danger-dark: #f87171; --card-shadow-dark: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.18); } * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; transition: background-color 0.3s ease, color 0.3s ease; } body.light { background-color: var(--bg-primary-light); color: var(--text-primary-light); } body.dark { background-color: var(--bg-primary-dark); color: var(--text-primary-dark); } .container { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 2rem 1rem; } .content-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 2rem; margin-top: 2rem; } @media (min-width: 768px) { .content-grid { grid-template-columns: 2fr 1fr; } } h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 { margin-bottom: 1rem; font-weight: 600; } button { cursor: pointer; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1rem; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border-radius: 0.375rem; transition: all 0.2s ease; } .light button.primary { background-color: var(--accent-light); color: white; border: none; } .light button.primary:hover { background-color: var(--accent-hover-light); } .dark button.primary { background-color: var(--accent-dark); color: white; border: none; } .dark button.primary:hover { background-color: var(--accent-hover-dark); } .light button.secondary { background-color: transparent; color: var(--text-primary-light); border: 1px solid var(--border-light); } .light button.secondary:hover { background-color: var(--border-light); } .dark button.secondary { background-color: transparent; color: var(--text-primary-dark); border: 1px solid var(--border-dark); } .dark button.secondary:hover { background-color: var(--border-dark); } input, select, textarea { font-family: inherit; font-size: 1rem; padding: 0.75rem; border-radius: 0.375rem; transition: all 0.2s ease; width: 100%; } .light input, .light select, .light textarea { background-color: white; color: var(--text-primary-light); border: 1px solid var(--border-light); } .light input:focus, .light select:focus, .light textarea:focus { outline: 2px solid var(--accent-light); border-color: transparent; } .dark input, .dark select, .dark textarea { background-color: var(--bg-secondary-dark); color: var(--text-primary-dark); border: 1px solid var(--border-dark); } .dark input:focus, .dark select:focus, .dark textarea:focus { outline: 2px solid var(--accent-dark); border-color: transparent; } .card { border-radius: 0.75rem; padding: 1.5rem; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; transition: all 0.3s ease; } .light .card { background-color: var(--bg-secondary-light); box-shadow: var(--card-shadow-light); } .dark .card { background-color: var(--bg-secondary-dark); box-shadow: var(--card-shadow-dark); } .empty-state { text-align: center; padding: 2rem; border-radius: 0.75rem; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; } .light .empty-state { background-color: var(--bg-secondary-light); color: var(--text-secondary-light); border: 2px dashed var(--border-light); } .dark .empty-state { background-color: var(--bg-secondary-dark); color: var(--text-secondary-dark); border: 2px dashed var(--border-dark); } .form-group { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; } .form-group label { display: block; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-weight: 500; } .light .form-group label { color: var(--text-primary-light); } .dark .form-group label { color: var(--text-primary-dark); } .form-actions { display: flex; justify-content: flex-end; gap: 1rem; margin-top: 1.5rem; } .badge { display: inline-flex; align-items: center; padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem; border-radius: 9999px; font-size: 0.875rem; font-weight: 500; } .light .badge.success { background-color: rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.1); color: var(--success-light); } .dark .badge.success { background-color: rgba(52, 211, 153, 0.1); color: var(--success-dark); } .light .badge.warning { background-color: rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.1); color: var(--warning-light); } .dark .badge.warning { background-color: rgba(251, 191, 36, 0.1); color: var(--warning-dark); } .light .badge.danger { background-color: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1); color: var(--danger-light); } .dark .badge.danger { background-color: rgba(248, 113, 113, 0.1); color: var(--danger-dark); } .header { padding: 1rem 0; border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-style: solid; } .light .header { background-color: var(--bg-secondary-light); border-bottom-color: var(--border-light); } .dark .header { background-color: var(--bg-secondary-dark); border-bottom-color: var(--border-dark); } .header-container { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 1rem; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; } .logo { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.5rem; font-weight: 700; font-size: 1.25rem; } .light .logo { color: var(--text-primary-light); } .dark .logo { color: var(--text-primary-dark); } .logo svg { width: 1.5rem; height: 1.5rem; } .light .logo svg { color: var(--accent-light); } .dark .logo svg { color: var(--accent-dark); } .theme-toggle { background: none; border: none; cursor: pointer; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; padding: 0.5rem; border-radius: 0.375rem; transition: background-color 0.2s ease; } .light .theme-toggle { color: var(--text-secondary-light); } .light .theme-toggle:hover { background-color: var(--border-light); } .dark .theme-toggle { color: var(--text-secondary-dark); } .dark .theme-toggle:hover { background-color: var(--border-dark); } .theme-toggle svg { width: 1.25rem; height: 1.25rem; } .dashboard { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr)); gap: 1.5rem; margin-bottom: 2rem; } .stat-card { display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: flex-start; padding: 1.5rem; border-radius: 0.75rem; transition: transform 0.2s ease, box-shadow 0.2s ease; } .stat-card:hover { transform: translateY(-5px); } .light .stat-card { background-color: var(--bg-secondary-light); box-shadow: var(--card-shadow-light); } .light .stat-card:hover { box-shadow: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05); } .dark .stat-card { background-color: var(--bg-secondary-dark); box-shadow: var(--card-shadow-dark); } .dark .stat-card:hover { box-shadow: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25), 0 4px 6px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); } .stat-card-icon { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; width: 3rem; height: 3rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .light .stat-card-icon.purple { background-color: rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1); color: var(--accent-light); } .dark .stat-card-icon.purple { background-color: rgba(129, 140, 248, 0.1); color: var(--accent-dark); } .light .stat-card-icon.green { background-color: rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.1); color: var(--success-light); } .dark .stat-card-icon.green { background-color: rgba(52, 211, 153, 0.1); color: var(--success-dark); } .light .stat-card-icon.orange { background-color: rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.1); color: var(--warning-light); } .dark .stat-card-icon.orange { background-color: rgba(251, 191, 36, 0.1); color: var(--warning-dark); } .light .stat-card-icon.red { background-color: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1); color: var(--danger-light); } .dark .stat-card-icon.red { background-color: rgba(248, 113, 113, 0.1); color: var(--danger-dark); } .stat-card-icon svg { width: 1.5rem; height: 1.5rem; } .stat-card-value { font-size: 2rem; font-weight: 700; margin-bottom: 0.25rem; } .light .stat-card-value { color: var(--text-primary-light); } .dark .stat-card-value { color: var(--text-primary-dark); } .stat-card-label { font-size: 0.875rem; font-weight: 500; } .light .stat-card-label { color: var(--text-secondary-light); } .dark .stat-card-label { color: var(--text-secondary-dark); } .progress-ring-container { position: relative; width: 100px; height: 100px; margin: 0 auto 1rem; } .progress-ring { transform: rotate(-90deg); transform-origin: 50% 50%; } .progress-ring-circle { fill: transparent; stroke-width: 8; stroke-linecap: round; transition: stroke-dashoffset 0.3s ease; } .light .progress-ring-circle.bg { stroke: var(--border-light); } .dark .progress-ring-circle.bg { stroke: var(--border-dark); } .light .progress-ring-circle.progress { stroke: var(--accent-light); } .dark .progress-ring-circle.progress { stroke: var(--accent-dark); } .progress-ring-text { position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); font-size: 1.25rem; font-weight: 700; } .light .progress-ring-text { color: var(--text-primary-light); } .dark .progress-ring-text { color: var(--text-primary-dark); } .habit-list { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 1rem; } .habit-item { border-radius: 0.75rem; padding: 1.25rem; transition: all 0.2s ease; } .light .habit-item { background-color: var(--bg-secondary-light); box-shadow: var(--card-shadow-light); } .dark .habit-item { background-color: var(--bg-secondary-dark); box-shadow: var(--card-shadow-dark); } .habit-header { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: flex-start; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .habit-title { font-size: 1.125rem; font-weight: 600; margin: 0; } .light .habit-title { color: var(--text-primary-light); } .dark .habit-title { color: var(--text-primary-dark); } .habit-actions { display: flex; gap: 0.5rem; } .habit-action-btn { background: none; border: none; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; padding: 0.375rem; border-radius: 0.375rem; transition: background-color 0.2s ease; } .light .habit-action-btn { color: var(--text-secondary-light); } .light .habit-action-btn:hover { background-color: var(--border-light); } .dark .habit-action-btn { color: var(--text-secondary-dark); } .dark .habit-action-btn:hover { background-color: var(--border-dark); } .habit-action-btn svg { width: 1.25rem; height: 1.25rem; } .habit-meta { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 1rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .habit-meta-item { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.375rem; } .light .habit-meta-item { color: var(--text-secondary-light); } .dark .habit-meta-item { color: var(--text-secondary-dark); } .habit-meta-item svg { width: 1rem; height: 1rem; } .habit-streak { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.5rem; padding: 0.375rem 0.75rem; border-radius: 9999px; font-size: 0.875rem; font-weight: 600; } .light .habit-streak { background-color: rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1); color: var(--accent-light); } .dark .habit-streak { background-color: rgba(129, 140, 248, 0.1); color: var(--accent-dark); } .habit-streak svg { width: 1rem; height: 1rem; } .habit-progress { margin-top: 1rem; } .progress-bar-container { height: 0.5rem; border-radius: 9999px; overflow: hidden; } .light .progress-bar-container { background-color: var(--border-light); } .dark .progress-bar-container { background-color: var(--border-dark); } .progress-bar { height: 100%; border-radius: 9999px; transition: width 0.3s ease; } .light .progress-bar { background-color: var(--accent-light); } .dark .progress-bar { background-color: var(--accent-dark); } .progress-text { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; margin-top: 0.5rem; font-size: 0.875rem; } .light .progress-text { color: var(--text-secondary-light); } .dark .progress-text { color: var(--text-secondary-dark); } .habit-calendar { display: flex; gap: 0.375rem; margin-top: 1rem; overflow-x: auto; padding-bottom: 0.5rem; } .calendar-day { display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; gap: 0.25rem; } .calendar-date { font-size: 0.75rem; font-weight: 500; } .light .calendar-date { color: var(--text-secondary-light); } .dark .calendar-date { color: var(--text-secondary-dark); } .calendar-marker { width: 2rem; height: 2rem; border-radius: 0.375rem; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.2s ease; } .light .calendar-marker { background-color: var(--border-light); } .light .calendar-marker:hover { background-color: rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1); } .dark .calendar-marker { background-color: var(--border-dark); } .dark .calendar-marker:hover { background-color: rgba(129, 140, 248, 0.1); } .light .calendar-marker.completed { background-color: var(--accent-light); color: white; } .dark .calendar-marker.completed { background-color: var(--accent-dark); color: white; } .light .calendar-marker.today { border: 2px solid var(--accent-light); } .dark .calendar-marker.today { border: 2px solid var(--accent-dark); } .calendar-marker svg { width: 1rem; height: 1rem; } .habit-form { margin-top: 2rem; } .habit-form-header { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; } .habit-form-title { font-size: 1.25rem; font-weight: 600; margin: 0; } .light .habit-form-title { color: var(--text-primary-light); } .dark .habit-form-title { color: var(--text-primary-dark); } .motivation-card { border-radius: 0.75rem; padding: 1.5rem; height: 100%; display: flex; flex-direction: column; } .light .motivation-card { background-color: var(--bg-secondary-light); box-shadow: var(--card-shadow-light); } .dark .motivation-card { background-color: var(--bg-secondary-dark); box-shadow: var(--card-shadow-dark); } .quote-container { margin-bottom: 2rem; } .quote { font-size: 1.125rem; font-weight: 500; font-style: italic; line-height: 1.6; margin-bottom: 1rem; position: relative; padding: 0 1.5rem; } .quote::before, .quote::after { content: '"'; font-size: 2rem; position: absolute; } .quote::before { left: 0; top: -0.5rem; } .quote::after { right: 0; bottom: -1rem; } .light .quote::before, .light .quote::after { color: var(--accent-light); } .dark .quote::before, .dark .quote::after { color: var(--accent-dark); } .quote-author { text-align: right; font-size: 0.875rem; font-weight: 500; } .light .quote-author { color: var(--text-secondary-light); } .dark .quote-author { color: var(--text-secondary-dark); } .streak-milestone { margin-top: 2rem; padding: 1.5rem; border-radius: 0.75rem; text-align: center; } .light .streak-milestone { background-color: rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.05); border: 1px solid rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.1); } .dark .streak-milestone { background-color: rgba(129, 140, 248, 0.05); border: 1px solid rgba(129, 140, 248, 0.1); } .milestone-title { font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; } .light .milestone-title { color: var(--text-primary-light); } .dark .milestone-title { color: var(--text-primary-dark); } .milestone-description { font-size: 0.875rem; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .light .milestone-description { color: var(--text-secondary-light); } .dark .milestone-description { color: var(--text-secondary-dark); } .milestone-progress { margin-top: 1rem; } .milestone-progress-bar { height: 0.5rem; border-radius: 9999px; overflow: hidden; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; } .light .milestone-progress-bar { background-color: var(--border-light); } .dark .milestone-progress-bar { background-color: var(--border-dark); } .milestone-progress-fill { height: 100%; border-radius: 9999px; transition: width 0.3s ease; } .light .milestone-progress-fill { background-color: var(--accent-light); } .dark .milestone-progress-fill { background-color: var(--accent-dark); } .milestone-progress-text { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; font-size: 0.75rem; font-weight: 500; } .light .milestone-progress-text { color: var(--text-secondary-light); } .dark .milestone-progress-text { color: var(--text-secondary-dark); } import { createContext, useContext, useState, useEffect, ReactNode } from 'react'; type Theme = 'light' | 'dark'; interface ThemeContextType { theme: Theme; toggleTheme: () => void; } const ThemeContext = createContext(undefined); export const ThemeProvider = ({ children }: { children: ReactNode }) => { // Check if user has a theme preference in localStorage const getInitialTheme = (): Theme => { const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme') as Theme | null; if (savedTheme) { return savedTheme; } // Check if user prefers dark mode const prefersDark = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches; return prefersDark ? 'dark' : 'light'; }; const [theme, setTheme] = useState(getInitialTheme); // Update localStorage when theme changes useEffect(() => { localStorage.setItem('theme', theme); }, [theme]); const toggleTheme = () => { setTheme(prevTheme => prevTheme === 'light' ? 'dark' : 'light'); }; return ( {children} ); }; export const useTheme = (): ThemeContextType => { const context = useContext(ThemeContext); if (context === undefined) { throw new Error('useTheme must be used within a ThemeProvider'); } return context; }; import { createContext, useContext, useState, useEffect, ReactNode } from 'react'; import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid'; import { format, subDays, isSameDay, differenceInDays, isToday } from 'date-fns'; export interface HabitDay { date: string; completed: boolean; } export interface Habit { id: string; title: string; description: string; frequency: 'daily' | 'weekly'; goal: number; color: string; createdAt: string; days: HabitDay[]; } interface HabitContextType { habits: Habit[]; addHabit: (habit: Omit) => void; updateHabit: (id: string, habit: Partial) => void; deleteHabit: (id: string) => void; toggleHabitCompletion: (habitId: string, date: string) => void; getHabitStreak: (habit: Habit) => number; getHabitProgress: (habit: Habit) => number; getTotalCompletions: () => number; getLongestStreak: () => number; getCurrentStreak: () => number; getCompletionRate: () => number; } const HabitContext = createContext(undefined); export const HabitProvider = ({ children }: { children: ReactNode }) => { const [habits, setHabits] = useState(() => { const savedHabits = localStorage.getItem('habits'); return savedHabits ? JSON.parse(savedHabits) : []; }); // Save habits to localStorage whenever they change useEffect(() => { localStorage.setItem('habits', JSON.stringify(habits)); }, [habits]); const addHabit = (habit: Omit) => { const now = new Date(); // Generate last 7 days for the habit const days: HabitDay[] = []; for (let i = 6; i >= 0; i--) { const date = subDays(now, i); days.push({ date: format(date, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), completed: false }); } const newHabit: Habit = { id: uuidv4(), ...habit, createdAt: now.toISOString(), days }; setHabits(prevHabits => [...prevHabits, newHabit]); }; const updateHabit = (id: string, updates: Partial) => { setHabits(prevHabits => prevHabits.map(habit => habit.id === id ? { ...habit, ...updates } : habit ) ); }; const deleteHabit = (id: string) => { setHabits(prevHabits => prevHabits.filter(habit => habit.id !== id)); }; const toggleHabitCompletion = (habitId: string, date: string) => { setHabits(prevHabits => prevHabits.map(habit => { if (habit.id !== habitId) return habit; // Check if the day exists const dayIndex = habit.days.findIndex(day => day.date === date); if (dayIndex >= 0) { // Toggle existing day const updatedDays = [...habit.days]; updatedDays[dayIndex] = { ...updatedDays[dayIndex], completed: !updatedDays[dayIndex].completed }; return { ...habit, days: updatedDays }; } else { // Add new day return { ...habit, days: [...habit.days, { date, completed: true }] }; } }) ); }; const getHabitStreak = (habit: Habit) => { // Sort days by date (newest first) const sortedDays = [...habit.days].sort((a, b) => new Date(b.date).getTime() - new Date(a.date).getTime() ); let streak = 0; let currentDate = new Date(); // Check if the most recent day is today or yesterday const mostRecentDay = sortedDays[0]; if (!mostRecentDay) return 0; const mostRecentDate = new Date(mostRecentDay.date); const dayDifference = differenceInDays(currentDate, mostRecentDate); // If the most recent day is more than 1 day ago and not completed, streak is 0 if (dayDifference > 1 && !mostRecentDay.completed) return 0; // Calculate streak for (const day of sortedDays) { const dayDate = new Date(day.date); // Check if this day is the expected next day in the streak if (isSameDay(currentDate, dayDate) || differenceInDays(currentDate, dayDate) === 1) { if (day.completed) { streak++; currentDate = dayDate; } else { break; } } else { // There's a gap in the streak break; } } return streak; }; const getHabitProgress = (habit: Habit) => { const completedDays = habit.days.filter(day => day.completed).length; return habit.days.length > 0 ? (completedDays / habit.days.length) * 100 : 0; }; const getTotalCompletions = () => { return habits.reduce((total, habit) => { return total + habit.days.filter(day => day.completed).length; }, 0); }; const getLongestStreak = () => { return habits.reduce((longest, habit) => { const streak = getHabitStreak(habit); return streak > longest ? streak : longest; }, 0); }; const getCurrentStreak = () => { return habits.reduce((total, habit) => { // Only count streaks for habits that have been completed today const todayCompleted = habit.days.some(day => isToday(new Date(day.date)) && day.completed ); return todayCompleted ? total + 1 : total; }, 0); }; const getCompletionRate = () => { if (habits.length === 0) return 0; const totalPossibleCompletions = habits.reduce((total, habit) => { return total + habit.days.length; }, 0); const totalCompletions = getTotalCompletions(); return totalPossibleCompletions > 0 ? (totalCompletions / totalPossibleCompletions) * 100 : 0; }; return ( {children} ); }; export const useHabit = (): HabitContextType => { const context = useContext(HabitContext); if (context === undefined) { throw new Error('useHabit must be used within a HabitProvider'); } return context; }; import { FiMoon, FiSun, FiActivity } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { useTheme } from '../context/ThemeContext'; import '../styles/Header.css'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; const Header = () => { const { theme, toggleTheme } = useTheme(); return (

content.text:
[Model: claude-3-7-sonnet-20250219]

[Provider: Anthropic]

Here are **clear, structured instructions** for an AI app developer (or for integrating into an existing Habit Tracker app) to transform it into a **Lucid Dreaming Trainer** using the **MILD technique**, with modules for **prospective memory**, **state testing**, **intention setting**, and **dream sign identification**.

---

## ðŸ”§ AI App Add-On Instructions for Lucid Dreaming Habit Tracker (MILD Technique)

### ðŸ” OVERVIEW:

The goal is to extend the current habit tracker into a lucid dreaming assistant that guides users through daily and nightly routines based on the **MILD (Mnemonic Induction of Lucid Dreams)** technique. This includes:

* **Morning reflection** and dream journaling
* **Daytime prospective memory training**
* **Reality (state) testing habits**
* **Evening intention and visualization**
* **Tracking of recurring patterns, emotions, and symbols**

---

## ðŸ§© 1. MODULES TO ADD

---

### ðŸŒ… **MORNING MODULE: DREAM RECALL + REFLECTION**

**Objective**: Reinforce memory and extract recurring dream elements

#### Features:

* **Prompt**: â€œDid you recall any dreams last night?â€ (Yes/No toggle)
* **Dream Journal Entry** (text field)

  * Optional tags: emotion, theme, location, characters
* **Dream Signs Tracker**:

  * Checkboxes or highlight tool for:

    * Recurring people
    * Places
    * Emotions
    * Objects
    * Actions (e.g., flying, being chased)

#### Optional:

* **Auto-suggestion**: AI highlights repeated patterns from past logs
* **Mood selector** (before and after dream recall)

---

### ðŸŒž **DAYTIME MODULE: PROSPECTIVE MEMORY + STATE TESTING**

**Objective**: Train awareness and mindfulness during the day to increase the chances of becoming lucid at night

#### Prospective Memory Exercise:

* Let users **set cues** like:

  * â€œWhen I see a mirror, I will do a reality check.â€
  * â€œWhen I feel frustrated, Iâ€™ll question reality.â€
* App reminds user to **log whether they remembered the cue**

#### State Testing (Reality Checks):

* Add as a **trackable habit**:

  * Default prompt: â€œDo a reality check nowâ€”ask: *Am I dreaming?*â€
  * Track how many times performed (goal: 5â€“10/day)
* Optional mini exercises:

  * Look at your hands
  * Read text twice
  * Pinch nose breathing

---

### ðŸŒ‡ **EVENING MODULE: REFLECTION + INTENTION SETTING**

**Objective**: Prepare the mind for lucid dreaming with focused intent

#### Features:

* Prompt: â€œDid you notice any dream-like moments today?â€
* Short reflection text box
* Intention Affirmation:

  * Pre-filled: â€œNext time Iâ€™m dreaming, I will remember Iâ€™m dreaming.â€
  * Custom user-written intention
* Save affirmation as part of bedtime ritual log

---

### ðŸŒŒ **MILD TECHNIQUE BEDTIME MODULE**

**Objective**: Reinforce intention while falling asleep

#### Sequence:

1. **Recall** most recent dream
2. **Visualize** becoming lucid in that dream
3. **Repeat intention** 3â€“5 times:

   * "Next time Iâ€™m dreaming, I will remember Iâ€™m dreaming."
4. Log whether MILD technique was completed (Yes/No)

#### Optional:

* Add **audio meditation** (guided induction)
* Add a **wind-down timer** with reminders to do the steps

---

## ðŸ“Š 2. TRACKING & DASHBOARD

#### Daily Tracker Includes:

* Dreams recalled (yes/no)
* State checks completed (number per day)
* Prospective memory cues remembered
* Intention set (yes/no)
* MILD exercise done (yes/no)
* Lucid dream occurrence (checkbox or text entry)

#### Weekly/Monthly Insights:

* Graphs of progress
* Dream signs heatmap (recurring themes)
* Lucidity trends over time

---

## ðŸ”” 3. NOTIFICATIONS & REMINDERS

| Time       | Message                                   |
| ---------- | ----------------------------------------- |
| Morning    | â€œTime to record your dreams ðŸŒ™â€           |
| Throughout | â€œReality check! Are you dreaming?â€        |
| Midday     | â€œReflect: Have you been aware today?â€     |
| Evening    | â€œReview your day and set your intention.â€ |
| Bedtime    | â€œDo your MILD practice now ðŸ’¤â€            |

---

## ðŸ§  4. OPTIONAL AI INTEGRATION FEATURES

* **Dream Sign Detection**: Analyze journal entries to identify recurring themes or symbols
* **Auto-Summary**: Condense dream entries into keywords/tags
* **Reminders Optimization**: AI adjusts reminder frequency based on missed logs
* **Voice input**: Users can speak dream entries

---

## âœ… FINAL GOAL

To create a self-contained, habit-forming daily structure that strengthens **dream recall**, **self-awareness**, and **lucid dream induction** using **MILD** and associated practices. This app should feel like a mindful assistant that evolves with the userâ€™s progress.

---

Would you like a flowchart, sample user interface screens, or user onboarding script next?

content.text:
[Model: claude-3-7-sonnet-20250219]

[Provider: Anthropic]

Here are **developer-ready instructions** to program the app to prompt the user **10, 15, or 20 times a day** with **audio, alarm, or vibration**, asking:

> **â€œIs this a dream?â€**

and then guiding them through a **state test**.

---

## ðŸ”§ FEATURE: Randomized â€œIs This a Dream?â€ Prompts with State Test

### ðŸŽ¯ Objective:

Trigger interactive prompts **10, 15, or 20 times per day**, spaced semi-randomly, to help build **prospective memory** and **habitual state testing** for lucid dreaming.

---

### ðŸ”¨ TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:

#### 1. **User Settings:**

Add an option in settings:

```json
{
  "daily_reminder_count": [10, 15, 20],
  "alert_type": ["sound", "vibrate", "voice_prompt"],
  "active_hours": {
    "start": "08:00",
    "end": "22:00"
  }
}
```

---

#### 2. **Prompt Scheduling Logic:**

* Divide the user's **active hours** into selected interval slots (e.g., for 15 prompts from 8amâ€“10pm â‰ˆ every 56 minutes).
* Add **Â±10 min randomization** to each interval to avoid predictability.
* Use `setTimeout()` or `alarmManager` (Android), `UNNotificationTrigger` (iOS) to schedule prompts.

---

#### 3. **Notification or Alert Format:**

Each prompt triggers:

* **Alarm tone OR vibration OR voice prompt** (based on user setting)
* Voice/Sound (playback or TTS):
  *"Is this a dream? Stop and check."*

---

#### 4. **State Test Flow UI:**

After the prompt, open a **mini guided state check panel**:

**Screen Elements:**

```plaintext
[ðŸ§  Is This a Dream?]

âœ” Look at your hands â€” do they look normal?
âœ” Pinch your nose â€” can you breathe through it?
âœ” Ask: What was I doing 5 minutes ago?
âœ” Try to push your finger through your palm

[ðŸŸ¢ YES - Reality is stable]
[ðŸ”´ NO - Something is off]
```

Let the user choose one and optionally **log a note** ("Felt like a dream", "Normal", etc.).

---

#### 5. **Data Logging:**

Store each response with:

```json
{
  "timestamp": "2025-05-27T14:30:00",
  "state_test_result": "Normal",
  "note": "Did a nose pinch",
  "was_dreamlike": false
}
```

Display daily/weekly **compliance charts** in the dashboard.

---

### ðŸ”” Notification Examples:

| Type             | Example                                               |
| ---------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| **Vibrate**      | Short buzz, followed by a popup: *â€œIs this a dream?â€* |
| **Sound**        | Chime + TTS voice: *â€œIs this a dream?â€*               |
| **Voice Prompt** | Record or synthesize: *â€œHey, check your reality!â€*    |

---

### ðŸš€ Optional Upgrades

* Let user **record their own voice prompt**.
* Let the app use **context-based triggers** (e.g., after a phone call, opening an app, etc.).
* **Gamify** state tests: points for completing tests, streaks, etc.

---

Would you like the **JavaScript or React Native code snippet** to start building this logic?

messages.content:
I'll run a preview of the application so you can see the educational content with the didgeridoo lessons.

<xbeshArtifact id="run-preview" title="Run Preview">
<xbeshAction type="start">npm run dev</xbeshAction>
</xbeshArtifact>

The preview is now running. You can see the educational content section with all resources, including the didgeridoo lessons. 

To view specifically the didgeridoo content:
1. Click on the "Didgeridoo" tab in the category navigation
2. You'll see all 5 didgeridoo lessons displayed in order of progression
3. Click on any lesson card to expand it and view the embedded video

The didgeridoo lessons are organized with progressive difficulty levels from beginner to advanced, with detailed descriptions for each video. You can also use the search functionality to find specific content related to didgeridoo techniques or healing practices.
